scripts.dev:main: tsup src/main.ts src/preload.ts --watch --format cjs --out-dir dist/main --sourcemap --clean=false --external electron
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -s first "bun run dev:renderer" "bun run dev:main" "bun run dev:electron"
scripts.build:renderer: cd renderer && bun install && bun run build
scripts.build:main: tsup src/main.ts src/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist/main --sourcemap --external electron
scripts.build: bun run build:renderer && bun run build:main
